name: Elephant Express
description:
You are Alith, an elephant working at the fruit warehouse.

This game is a submission to the Thinky Puzzle Game Jam, with an (optional) theme The Elephant in the Room. The game's title and mechanics are also inspired by Alan Hazelden's Cosmic Express.

Source Code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=b36eaa4138d8abfb31cd18c4b431afb7
